main_definition: Posting refers to the act of sharing information or content on a public platform, typically through social media or online forums.

meanings_and_examples.example: She made a Facebook post announcing her engagement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Delivery of mail or packages by postal services
meanings_and_examples.example: The postman delivered the package to my doorstep today.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Assigning tasks to a specific time or date
meanings_and_examples.example: I have posted the meeting agenda for tomorrow at 10 AM.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adding items to an online marketplace listing
meanings_and_examples.example: She updated her eBay posting with new photos and prices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Placing a bet or wager in gambling activities
meanings_and_examples.example: He posted his money on the roulette table at the casino.
